page.title: 20HOW WE DID THE SURVEY
page.content:
WE SPENT SEVERAL LESSONS BEFORE WE WENT OUT TO COLLECT THE INFORMATION, ORGANIZING WHO WAS GOING TO DO WHICH SQUARE, THEN WE WERE TOLD WHAT SORT OF INFORMATION WE WERE EXPECTED TO COLLECT. WE WERE EACH GIVEN A MAP OF THE AREA, WE HAD DECIDED TO COLLECT ALL THE INFORMATION IN ONE DAY (IN ORDER TO EASE ORGANISATION). SO WE ALL SET OFF FOR OUR SQUARES IN GROUPS OF TWO OR THREE. WE SPENT THE WHOLE DAY NOTING THE LAND COVER AND CONDUCTING INTERVIEWS. THAT AFTERNOON WE GOT BACK TO SCHOOL. THE LAND COVER AND AMENITIES WERE ENTERED INTO THE COMPUTER. THEN OVER THE NEXT FEW WEEKS THE PAGES OF TEXT WERE ENTERED BY THE INDIVIDUAL CONTRIBUTORS.
{G.TOONE
